item.title: pyenv管理Python版本
item.description: 安装 curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yyuu/pyenv-installer/master/bin/pyenv-installer | bash 添加以下语句到.bashrc并重新source。 export PATH="/home/<user>/.pyenv/bin:$PATH" eval "$(pyenv init -)" eval "$(pyenv virtualenv-init -)" 运行一下pyenv update。 依赖 编译Python时需要一些依赖。 Ubuntu/Debian: sudo apt-get install -y make build-essential libssl-dev zlib1g-dev libbz2-dev \ libreadline-dev libsqlite3-dev wget curl llvm libncurses5-dev libncursesw5-dev xz-utils Fedora/CentOS/RHEL: FIXME: you may need to install xz to build some CPython version yum install zlib-devel bzip2 bzip2-devel readline-devel sqlite sqlite-devel openssl-devel Mac OS X:
